result.markdown: --- title: "DCAT Schema" editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html} DCAT Schema ISO8601 ``` ::: ::: ## `dataset` Fields * [Data Catalog Vocabulary (DCAT) - Version 3](https://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat/) ### `bureauCode` Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from [OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C](https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/sites/default/files/omb/assets/a11_current_year/app_c.pdf). > __Format__: `015:11` ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` - $agency_name c1 Department of Health and Human Services - $bureau_name c1 Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services - $agency_code c1 009 - $bureau_code c1 38 - $treasury_code c1 75 - $cgac_code c1 075 ``` ::: ::: ### `programCode` Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the [Federal Program Inventory](https://resources.data.gov/schemas/dcat-us/v1.1/FederalProgramInventory_FY13_MachineReadable_091613.csv). > __Format__: `015:001` ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` - $agency_name c1 Department of Health and Human Services - $program_name c1 (Primary Program Not Available) - $additional_information_optional c1 NA - $agency_code c1 009 - $program_code c1 009-000 - $program_code_pod_format c1 009:000 ``` ::: ::: ### `accrualPeriodicity` ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} tibble( accrualPeriodicity = c("R/P1M", "R/P1W", "R/P1Y", "R/P2W", "R/P3.5D", "R/P3M", "R/P6M"), meaning = recode_iso_8601(accrualPeriodicity)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 7 × 2 accrualPeriodicity meaning 1 R/P1M Monthly 2 R/P1W Weekly 3 R/P1Y Annual 4 R/P2W Biweekly 5 R/P3.5D Semiweekly 6 R/P3M Quarterly 7 R/P6M Semiannual ``` ::: ::: ### DCAT Schemas #### Catalog ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} read_json_arrow( here("data/dcat-us_v1.1_schema_catalog.json")) |> unnest(properties) |> unnest(`@context`, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(`@id`, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(`@type`, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(`@type_enum`, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(conformsTo, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(conformsTo_enum, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(describedBy, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(dataset, names_sep = "_") |> unnest(dataset_items, names_sep = "_") |> mutate(dependencies = delist(dependencies), required = flatten_column(required)) |> purse() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` - $$schema c1 http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema# ... - $id c1 https://project-open-data.cio.gov/v1.1/sche ... - $title c1 Project Open Data Catalog ... - $description c1 Validates an entire collection of Project O ... - $type c1 object ... - $dependencies c1 @context ... - $required c1 conformsTo, dataset ... - $@context_title c1 Metadata Context ... - $@context_description c1 URL or JSON object for the JSON-LD Context ... - $@context_type c1 string ... - $@context_format c1 uri ... - $@id_title c1 Metadata Catalog ID ... - $@id_description c1 IRI for the JSON-LD Node Identifier of the ... - $@id_type c1 string ... - $@id_format c1 uri ... - $@type_title c1 Metadata Context ... - $@type_description c1 IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should ... - $@type_enum c1 dcat:Catalog ... - $conformsTo_description c1 Version of Schema ... - $conformsTo_title c1 Version of Schema ... - $conformsTo_enum c1 https://project-open-data.cio.gov/v1.1/sche ... - $describedBy_description c1 URL for the JSON Schema file that defines t ... - $describedBy_title c1 Data Dictionary ... - $describedBy_type c1 string ... - $describedBy_format c1 uri ... - $dataset_type c1 array ... - $dataset_items_$ref c1 dataset.json ... - $dataset_items_minItems i1 1 ... - $dataset_items_uniqueItems l1 T ... ``` ::: ::: #### Dataset ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} read_json_arrow( here("data/dcat-us_v1.1_schema_dataset.json")) |> glimpse() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 1 Columns: 7 $ `$schema` "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#" $ id "https://project-open-data.cio.gov/v1.1/schema/dataset.jso… $ title "Project Open Data Dataset" $ description "The metadata format for all federal open data. Validates … $ type "object" $ required > <"bureauCode", "programCode", "title", "description", "key… $ properties ``` ::: ::: #### Distribution ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} read_json_arrow( here("data/dcat-us_v1.1_schema_distribution.json")) |> glimpse() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 1 Columns: 7 $ `$schema` "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#" $ id "https://project-open-data.cio.gov/v1.1/schema/distributi… $ title "Project Open Data Distribution" $ description "Validates an entire collection of common core metadata J… $ type "object" $ dependencies $ properties ``` ::: :::
